These exercises cover the sections of Statistics in R [Session1: data summary]("Session1_describe_the_data.md").

**Exercise 1**

- Read in the file Life_expectancy_at_birth.csv.
- How many males and females in England.
- What is the mean of the life.expectancy in the area England? 
- What are the means of the life.expectancy of Males and Females, respectively, in area England?
- What are quantiles of the life.expectancy in the area Wales, N.Ireland, and in Scotland, respectively.
